analyzed: bsam pa med pa dang phyir 'ong ba'i sems med pas mtshams las 'das na ni /
translated: and the thought of a once-returner are absent. If one transgresses the boundary,

original: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de dbyung bas 'gro ba'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de dbyung bas 'gro ba'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
translated: the suspension of the summer retreat is automatically lifted.🔽When one has gone outside the boundary, if the thought of a non-returner arises,

original: mtshams kyi phyi rol du son pa na phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems skyes sam /
analyzed: mtshams kyi phyi rol du son pa na phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems skyes sam /
translated: When one has gone beyond the boundary, the thought of a non-returner arises.

original: phyir 'ong ba la the tshom za ba'i sems skyes shing chos gos bya ba'i bsam pas rjes su 'brel pa med par gyur na ni /
analyzed: phyir 'ong ba la the tshom za ba'i sems skyes shing chos gos bya ba'i bsam pas rjes su 'brel pa med par gyur na ni /
translated: If one doubts whether one will return and one’s mind is not connected with the thought of making robes,

original: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de nges par byed pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de nges par byed pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
translated: then the extension of the robe season is definitely concluded by the end of the day.

original: chos gos bya ba'i bsam pas rjes su 'brel pa yod cing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems kyis sam the tshom za ba'i sems kyis 'gro bar byed pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol du son pa na chos gos bya ba'i bsam par rjes su 'brel pa yod cing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems sam the tshom za ba'i sems skyes pa la ni /
analyzed: chos gos bya ba'i bsam pas rjes su 'brel pa yod cing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems kyis sam the tshom za ba'i sems kyis 'gro bar byed pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol du son pa na chos gos bya ba'i bsam par rjes su 'brel pa yod cing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems sam the tshom za ba'i sems skyes pa la ni /
translated: If one’s mind is connected with the thought of making robes, and one goes with the thought of a nonreturner or with doubt, and if one’s mind is connected with the thought of making robes when one reaches the outer boundary, and one has the thought of a nonreturner or doubt,

original: gal te mthar thug par gyur pa chos gos byed par gyur pa nyid chad par gyur na ni de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de mthar thug par gyur pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no /
analyzed: gal te mthar thug par gyur pa chos gos byed par gyur pa nyid chad par gyur na ni de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de mthar thug par gyur pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no /
translated: If the final stage of making the robe is interrupted, then the lifting of the restriction occurs through the end of the final stage.

original: gal te brtsams pa zhig bar gyur pas chos gos byed par 'gyur ba nyid chad par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te brtsams pa zhig bar gyur pas chos gos byed par 'gyur ba nyid chad par gyur na ni /
translated: If the beginning of making the robe is interrupted,

original: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de zhig par gyur pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de zhig par gyur pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
translated: then the lifting of the restriction occurs through the end of the interruption.

original: gal te bsam pa'i rgyun chad pas chos gos byed par 'gyur ba nyid chad par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te bsam pa'i rgyun chad pas chos gos byed par 'gyur ba nyid chad par gyur na ni /
translated: If the continuity of the intention is interrupted,

original: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de bsam pa'i rgyun chad pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de bsam pa'i rgyun chad pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
translated: then the lifting of the restriction occurs through the end of the interruption of the continuity of the intention.

original: chos gos bya ba'i bsam pa la the tshom za zhing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems kyis sam /
analyzed: chos gos bya ba'i bsam pa la the tshom za zhing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems kyis sam /
translated: If one doubts whether to make the robe and does not return, then the lifting of the restriction occurs through the end of the doubt.

original: phyir 'ong ba la the tshom za ba'i sems kyis mtshams las 'das pa dang chos gos bya ba'i bsam pa med cing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems kyis sam phyir 'ong ba la the tshom za ba'i sems kyis mtshams las 'das na ni /
analyzed: phyir 'ong ba la the tshom za ba'i sems kyis mtshams las 'das pa dang chos gos bya ba'i bsam pa med cing phyir mi 'ong ba'i sems kyis sam phyir 'ong ba la the tshom za ba'i sems kyis mtshams las 'das na ni /
translated: If one who is a once-returner crosses the boundary with a mind of doubt, or with a mind of non-returner, or if one who is a non-returner crosses the boundary with a mind of doubt, or with a mind of once-returner, then the extension of the robe-making season is not entered into by that one.

original: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de mtshams las 'da' ba'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba de mtshams las 'da' ba'i mtha' las byung ba yin no //
translated: The extension of the robe-making season is not entered into by that one who has crossed the boundary.

original: sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba bshad zin to /
analyzed: sra brkyang dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba bshad zin to /
translated: The extension of the robe-making season is not entered into by that one who has crossed the boundary has been explained.

original: // / da ni bya ba nges pa'i sgo nas bcos ma brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni bya ba nges pa'i sgo nas bcos ma brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the correction should be stated from the viewpoint of the ascertainment of the action.

original: de'i phyir las las gzhan pa'i bya ba rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir las las gzhan pa'i bya ba rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “The action should not be performed by another.”

original: las zhes @165b bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las 'og nas 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: las zhes @165b bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las 'og nas 'byung ba ste /
translated: The action is the four-part action with proposal that will be explained below.

original: de las gzhan pa sbyong bas 'gro ba la sogs pa rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa sbyong bas 'gro ba la sogs pa rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o //
translated: The action should not be performed by another, such as by one who is expelled.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught.

original: las kyi mtshan nyid kyi bya ba ma gtogs pa bya ba gzhan gyis sra brkyang dbyung ba bcos ma mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: las kyi mtshan nyid kyi bya ba ma gtogs pa bya ba gzhan gyis sra brkyang dbyung ba bcos ma mi bya ba ste /
translated: Except for the rite of the characteristics of the action, the rite of the extension of the kaṭhina should not be done by another rite.

original: 'di ltar sems bskyed bas kyang dbyung ba 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems bskyed bas kyang dbyung ba 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the extension of the kaṭhina is accomplished by the generation of the thought.

original: 'dir sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni bdag la sra brkyang mi dgos so snyams du ltos pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni bdag la sra brkyang mi dgos so snyams du ltos pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: Here, the generation of the thought is the generation of the thought without regard for oneself, thinking, “I do not need the kaṭhina.”

original: de'i dus ni dpyid zlar ba nya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i dus ni dpyid zlar ba nya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The time for that is the full moon of Kārttika.

original: sra brkyang dbyung ba'i phyir las bya ba de'i dus ni dpyid zla ra ba nya ste de'i dus su de bya'o ;
analyzed: sra brkyang dbyung ba'i phyir las bya ba de'i dus ni dpyid zla ra ba nya ste de'i dus su de bya'o ;
translated: The time for the performance of the action for the extension of the kaṭhina is the full moon of Kārttika.

original: / mod la'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / mod la'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The time is the same day.

original: lo gnyis la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i dpyid zla ra ba nyar thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir tshig 'di smos te /
analyzed: lo gnyis la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i dpyid zla ra ba nyar thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir tshig 'di smos te /
translated: This phrase is stated to eliminate the possibility that the full moon of Kārttika would be connected with two years, etc.

original: dbyar de nyid kyi bar du mchod pa'i mod la 'byung ba'i dpyid zla ra ba nya kho na la sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyar de nyid kyi bar du mchod pa'i mod la 'byung ba'i dpyid zla ra ba nya kho na la sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: The kaṭhina should be extended on the very same day of the full moon of Kārttika, up until the end of the rainy season.

original: dus de'i mdun rol du sra brkyang 'dir ba'i dge slong gis der gtogs pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la sang sra brkyang 'byin par 'gyur gyi khyed cag gis rang gi chos gos dag byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dus de'i mdun rol du sra brkyang 'dir ba'i dge slong gis der gtogs pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la sang sra brkyang 'byin par 'gyur gyi khyed cag gis rang gi chos gos dag byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Before that time, the monk who is the overseer of the rainy season retreat should say to all the members of the saṅgha who belong to that saṅgha, ‘Tomorrow the rainy season retreat will end. You should consecrate your robes.’

original: dpyid zla ra ba nyal gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis sra brkyang dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: dpyid zla ra ba nyal gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis sra brkyang dbyung bar bya ste /
translated: After the rainy season retreat in the first autumn month, the rainy season retreat should be ended by a formal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement.

original: 'di'i sngags ni /
analyzed: 'di'i sngags ni /
translated: The formula for that is:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: ‘Venerables, please listen!

original: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las /
analyzed: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las /
translated: In this place, a monk has laid out the saṅgha’s rain retreat robe.

original: de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te /🔽gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te / gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
translated: The fifteenth day, which follows that, is the time for ending the rainy season retreat.

original: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do //
translated: If it seems appropriate to the saṅgha, the saṅgha should end the rainy season retreat.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: ‘Venerables, please listen!

original: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te /
translated: In this place, a monk has spread out the saṃgha’s bedding. The fifteenth day after that is the time for following that.

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin na sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin na sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: If the saṃgha agrees to take up the bedding, then let them not speak. Those who do not agree should speak.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung lags te /
translated: The saṃgha has agreed and has consented to take up the bedding.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin @166a * //🔽to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin @166a * // to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Since the saṃgha has not spoken, this is how I will hold it.

original: bcom pa'i don nyid du ni sngar yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom pa'i don nyid du ni sngar yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of “destroyed” is the same as before.

original: da'i dus yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: da'i dus yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: This should be applied to “this is the time.”

original: dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa dag gi don du ni dpyid zla ra ba'i nya bas sngar yang dbyung ba'i dus yin te /
analyzed: dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa dag gi don du ni dpyid zla ra ba'i nya bas sngar yang dbyung ba'i dus yin te /
translated: The time for taking up the bedding is before the full moon of the first autumn month for the sake of monks who have been destroyed by thieves.

original: de'i don du yang zla ba nya shi'i gso sbyong gi dus gcig dang sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i don du yang zla ba nya shi'i gso sbyong gi dus gcig dang sbyar te /
translated: For that purpose, it is also applied to the time of the poṣadha purification on the full moon day of the last month of the year.

original: sngar gso sbyong byas la de'i mod la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngar gso sbyong byas la de'i mod la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: The poṣadha purification is performed first, and immediately after that, the saṃgha is dismissed by means of the four-part formal procedure.🔽The mantra for this is:

original: 'di'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun ba rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: 'di'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun ba rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable saṃgha, please listen!

original: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags la /
translated: In this place, the saṃgha’s summer retreat has been entered by the monks, but monks who have been robbed by thieves have arrived.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la ba bcing bzod na /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la ba bcing bzod na /
translated: If the saṃgha can wait for a short time,

original: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do //
translated: please grant permission, and the saṃgha will perform the dismissal of the summer retreat based on the monks who have been robbed by thieves.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the request.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Venerable saṃgha, please listen!

original: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags te /
translated: In this place, the saṃgha’s summer retreat has been entered by the monks, but monks who have been robbed by thieves have arrived.

original: de'i slad du chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad na /
analyzed: de'i slad du chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad na /
translated: Therefore, if the saṅgha should open the rainy season retreat due to the monks who were robbed by thieves,🔽those who agree that the saṅgha should open the rainy season retreat due to the monks who were robbed by thieves should remain silent.

original: chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: Those who do not agree should speak.

original: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung lags te /
translated: The saṅgha has agreed and assented to the saṅgha opening the rainy season retreat due to the monks who were robbed by thieves.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Since the saṅgha remains silent, I will hold this to be its agreement.

original: de nyams sum myong ba dang ldan pa la ni ma thos kyi bar du phan yon rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyams sum myong ba dang ldan pa la ni ma thos kyi bar du phan yon rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The benefits of the rainy season retreat follow one who possesses it until one hears the teaching.

original: gang gis sngar dus ma yin pa der sra brkyang dbyung ba nyams su ma myong ba dang ldan pa de la ni ji srid du sra brkyang phyung ba des ma thos kyi bar du mtshams kyi nang ngam phyi rol na 'dug kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gang gis sngar dus ma yin pa der sra brkyang dbyung ba nyams su ma myong ba dang ldan pa de la ni ji srid du sra brkyang phyung ba des ma thos kyi bar du mtshams kyi nang ngam phyi rol na 'dug kyang rung ste /
translated: For one who has not previously experienced the lifting of the prohibition, the benefit of the lifting of the prohibition exists for him, whether he is inside or outside the boundary, until he hears of the lifting of the prohibition.

original: sra brkyang bting ba de'i phan yon rjes su 'jug cing yod do //
analyzed: sra brkyang bting ba de'i phan yon rjes su 'jug cing yod do //
translated: The benefit of the lifting of the prohibition continues until he hears of it.

original: nam thos pa'i tshe na ni de'i phan yon ldog cing med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam thos pa'i tshe na ni de'i phan yon ldog cing med par 'gyur ro //
translated: When he hears of it, the benefit ceases and no longer exists.

original: 'di ni sra brkyang dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni sra brkyang dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba yin te /
translated: This is the arising of the lifting of the prohibition from hearing the end of the proclamation.

original: 'di yang ma lta bu'i @166b tshig yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang ma lta bu'i @166b tshig yin no //
translated: This is also a statement like the example of the mother.

original: gtsug lag las sra brkyang dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba ni 'dun pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de 'di yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag las sra brkyang dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba ni 'dun pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de 'di yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: In the scriptures, it is said that the arising of the lifting of the prohibition from hearing the end of the proclamation is aspiration. This should be understood.

original: ci gnas skabs thams cad la ma thos kyi bar du phan yon de rjes su 'jug gam zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ci gnas skabs thams cad la ma thos kyi bar du phan yon de rjes su 'jug gam zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Does that benefit continue until one hears of it in all circumstances? Therefore it is said:

original: rjes su 'brel ba med na'o zhes bya ba smas te /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel ba med na'o zhes bya ba smas te /
translated: If there is no connection.

original: rjes su 'brel ba'i shan med na ma thos kyi bar du rjes su 'jug gi thos na ni ldog go //
analyzed: rjes su 'brel ba'i shan med na ma thos kyi bar du rjes su 'jug gi thos na ni ldog go //
translated: If there is no connection, then the benefit continues until one hears the Dharma, but if one hears the Dharma, it is stopped.

original: rjes su 'brel ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What is called connection?

original: gos la re ba yod pa dang gos brtsams pa ma zhig pa dang gos brtsams pa mthar thug par ma gyur pa'i shan yod na'o //
analyzed: gos la re ba yod pa dang gos brtsams pa ma zhig pa dang gos brtsams pa mthar thug par ma gyur pa'i shan yod na'o //
translated: If there is a desire for clothing, if the making of clothing is not destroyed, and if the making of clothing is not completed.

original: de med pa ni rjes su 'brel pa med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de med pa ni rjes su 'brel pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The absence of that is called no connection.

original: rjes su 'brel pa yod pa la ji srid du phan yon de rjes su 'jug ce na de'i phyir yod na ma chad kyi bar du'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa yod pa la ji srid du phan yon de rjes su 'jug ce na de'i phyir yod na ma chad kyi bar du'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: For as long as the benefit continues when there is a connection, therefore it is said, “If there is, until it is cut off.”

original: rjes su 'brel pa yod pa la ni rjes su 'brel pa yod pa de nyid ma chad kyi bar du de'i phan yon rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa yod pa la ni rjes su 'brel pa yod pa de nyid ma chad kyi bar du de'i phan yon rjes su 'jug go //
translated: For as long as the connection exists, the benefit continues as long as that connection exists.

original: de chad na ni phan yon de ldog go //
analyzed: de chad na ni phan yon de ldog go //
translated: If it is cut off, that benefit is stopped.

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las sa brkyang dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las sa brkyang dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “arising from the end of hearing”?

original: mtshams kyi phyi rol du shan med pa'i rgyud kyis thos pa dang gos la re ba chad pa dang / shan yod pa na gos zin par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mtshams kyi phyi rol du shan med pa'i rgyud kyis thos pa dang gos la re ba chad pa dang / shan yod pa na gos zin par gyur pa ste /
translated: When one is outside the boundary, one’s robe is lost if one is separated from it by a non-contiguous boundary, or if one’s hope for a robe is cut off, or if one’s robe is finished within a contiguous boundary.

original: gal te gos la re ba yod pa dang brtsams pa ni shan gyi rgyun yod par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te gos la re ba yod pa dang brtsams pa ni shan gyi rgyun yod par brjod par bya ste /
translated: If one’s hope for a robe exists and one begins to make a robe, one should say that one’s robe is in a continuous boundary.

original: de bzhin du de 'jug go zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de 'jug go zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, one should enter that boundary.

original: 'dis chog go snyam du bsam pa brtul na rnyed pa 'byung bar snang ba yang rung /
analyzed: 'dis chog go snyam du bsam pa brtul na rnyed pa 'byung bar snang ba yang rung /
translated: If one thinks, “This is enough,” and one’s intention is firm, it is also suitable to appear to obtain a robe.

original: gos brtsams pa nyid snang du zin kyang rung bsam pa mthar thug pa dang re ba chad pa yin par rig par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gos brtsams pa nyid snang du zin kyang rung bsam pa mthar thug pa dang re ba chad pa yin par rig par bya ba'o //
translated: Even if one appears to begin making a robe, one should understand that one’s intention is final and one’s hope is cut off.

original: de gnyis ni mthar thug pa'i mtha' las byung ba dang re ba chad pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i rnam pa gzhan gnyis yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis ni mthar thug pa'i mtha' las byung ba dang re ba chad pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i rnam pa gzhan gnyis yin no //
translated: These two are the other two types: arising from a final boundary and arising from a boundary of cut off hope.

original: zhig par gyur pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang 'dir 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: zhig par gyur pa'i mtha' las byung ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang 'dir 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that other aspects arise from the end of the dissolution.

original: ma phyung na thams cad kyi de'i dus kyi rnyed pa bsgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma phyung na thams cad kyi de'i dus kyi rnyed pa bsgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not removed, the announcement of the acquisition of the time of the spread of the mat should not be made to all.

original: sra brkyang gi chos gos de ma phyung na dge slong thams cad kyi sra brkyang bting ba'i dus de'i rnyed pa bsgo bar mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: sra brkyang gi chos gos de ma phyung na dge slong thams cad kyi sra brkyang bting ba'i dus de'i rnyed pa bsgo bar mi bya ba ste /
translated: If that Dharma robe called the spread of the mat is not removed, the announcement of the acquisition of the time of the spread of the mat should not be made to all monks.

original: 'di ltar sra brkyang zhes bya ba'i chos gos de ni chos gos byin gyis brlab tu rung ba gzhan dag gi gter gyi gnas lta bu yin pas /🔽gang gi tshe de 'ding bar byed pa thams cad kyis de phyung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na sra brkyang bting ba'i @167a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar sra brkyang zhes bya ba'i chos gos de ni chos gos byin gyis brlab tu rung ba gzhan dag gi gter gyi gnas lta bu yin pas / gang gi tshe de 'ding bar byed pa thams cad kyis de phyung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na sra brkyang bting ba'i @167a * //
translated: In this way, that Dharma robe called the spread of the mat is like a treasure house for other suitable consecrated robes.

original: dus las byung ba'i rnyed par bsgo bar bya'i /
analyzed: dus las byung ba'i rnyed par bsgo bar bya'i /
translated: When it is spread, all should remove it. At that time, the announcement of the acquisition of the time of the spread of the mat should be made.

original: de ma phyung ba'i sngon rol du ni bsgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ma phyung ba'i sngon rol du ni bsgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: But before it is removed, the announcement should not be made. This is the meaning.

original: gzhir gtogs pa'i sra brkyang gi gzhi'o zhes bya ba 'dul ba gzhi'i skabs su gtogs pa'i sra brkyang gi gzhi bshad zin to /
analyzed: gzhir gtogs pa'i sra brkyang gi gzhi'o zhes bya ba 'dul ba gzhi'i skabs su gtogs pa'i sra brkyang gi gzhi bshad zin to /
translated: The basis of the rite of spreading the robe is explained in the section on the Vinaya.

original: // / da ni sra brkyang gi gzhi zhu ba la sogs par gtogs pa bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni sra brkyang gi gzhi zhu ba la sogs par gtogs pa bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: Now, the rite of spreading the robe and so on should be included in the questions.

original: de la sngar sra brkyang gding bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la sngar sra brkyang gding bar bya'o //
translated: First, the robe should be spread.

original: tshes bcu drug la'o //
analyzed: tshes bcu drug la'o //
translated: On the sixteenth day.

original: ston zla 'bring po'i zhes smos pas /
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po'i zhes smos pas /
translated: Since it is said, “In the middle autumn month,”🔽if the time to spread the robe is the sixteenth day of the middle autumn month, then the intercalary month should follow the king.

original: ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug la sra brkyang gding ba'i dus yin na shol gyi zla ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes smos pas gal te ston zla 'bring po gnyis su rgyal pos byas na de'i tshe zla ba de gnyis gang la sra🔽brkyang gding bar bya zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug la sra brkyang gding ba'i dus yin na shol gyi zla ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes smos pas gal te ston zla 'bring po gnyis su rgyal pos byas na de'i tshe zla ba de gnyis gang la sra brkyang gding bar bya zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: If the king makes two middle autumn months, then on which of those two months should the robe be spread?

original: dgag dbye ji lta ba bzhin du gding ngo zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dgag dbye ji lta ba bzhin du gding ngo zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “It should be spread according to the proclamation.”

original: dgag dbye'i nyi ma'i rjes su 'brang bas sra brkyang gding bar bya'i shol gyi zla ba'i rjes su 'brang bas ni mi bya'o //🔽des na rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bas na dbyar zla 'bring po nya nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig dang / dbyar zla tha chungs nya nas ston zla ra ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig dang / ston zla ra ba nya nas ston zla 'bring pho nya'i bar gyi zla ba gsum po dag thal ba'i rjes la ston zla 'bring po nya nas ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba de ngo gnyis su gyur na /
analyzed: dgag dbye'i nyi ma'i rjes su 'brang bas sra brkyang gding bar bya'i shol gyi zla ba'i rjes su 'brang bas ni mi bya'o // des na rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bas na dbyar zla 'bring po nya nas dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig dang / dbyar zla tha chungs nya nas ston zla ra ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba gcig dang / ston zla ra ba nya nas ston zla 'bring pho nya'i bar gyi zla ba gsum po dag thal ba'i rjes la ston zla 'bring po nya nas ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar gyi zla ba de ngo gnyis su gyur na /
translated: The first day of the rainy season retreat is determined by the day of the full moon, but the first day of the retreat for the lifting of restrictions is determined by the day of the new moon.🔽Therefore, the first day of the rainy season retreat is the full moon of the middle summer month, and the first day of the retreat for the lifting of restrictions is the full moon of the last summer month.🔽The first day of the retreat for the lifting of restrictions is the first day of the last autumn month, and the first day of the retreat for the lifting of restrictions is the first day of the middle autumn month.

original: de'i tshe ston zla 'bring po nya'i nyin mo dgag dbye byas pa'i phyi de nyin par ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug ces bya ba'i nyi ma dang po de la sra brkyang gding bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ston zla 'bring po nya'i nyin mo dgag dbye byas pa'i phyi de nyin par ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug ces bya ba'i nyi ma dang po de la sra brkyang gding bar bya'o //
translated: The first day of the retreat for the lifting of restrictions is the first day of the first autumn month.

original: sngar yang ma yin phyis kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar yang ma yin phyis kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the former, nor is it the latter.

original: 'di ltar 'thab krol can dag 'ong du dogs pa'i dbang gis sngar dgag dbye byed pa yang yod la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'thab krol can dag 'ong du dogs pa'i dbang gis sngar dgag dbye byed pa yang yod la /
translated: Because sometimes the invitation is done earlier, due to the fear that quarrelsome monks will come.

original: 'thab krol can dag ma dong ba'i dbang gis phyis dgag dbye byed pa yang yod pas snga phyi de gnyis kyi dus la ltos pa'i tshes bcu drug la sra brkyang gding bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'thab krol can dag ma dong ba'i dbang gis phyis dgag dbye byed pa yang yod pas snga phyi de gnyis kyi dus la ltos pa'i tshes bcu drug la sra brkyang gding bar mi bya'o //
translated: Sometimes the invitation is done later, due to the absence of quarrelsome monks. Therefore, the invitation should not be done on the sixteenth day of the half-month that is dependent on either the former or the latter.🔽The invitation should not be done at the end of the purification and restoration ceremony.

original: gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /🔽sra brkyang gding ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni / sra brkyang gding ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The invitation should not be done at the end of the purification and restoration ceremony.

original: 'dir gso sbyong zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tshes bco lnga'i gso sbyong gi dus su dgag dbye byas pa'o //🔽de'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni ston zla 'bring po nyal dgag dbye byas pa de nyid kyi phyi de nyin par ste /
analyzed: 'dir gso sbyong zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tshes bco lnga'i gso sbyong gi dus su dgag dbye byas pa'o // de'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni ston zla 'bring po nyal dgag dbye byas pa de nyid kyi phyi de nyin par ste /
translated: Here, the term purification and restoration refers to the invitation done on the fifteenth day of the purification and restoration ceremony.

original: ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug go //
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug go //
translated: Its end refers to the sixteenth day of the autumn half-month, the day after the invitation of the autumn half-month.

original: de bas na ston zla 'bring @167b po chos bcu drug ma yin pa'i dus gzhan la sra brkyang gding bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na ston zla 'bring @167b po chos bcu drug ma yin pa'i dus gzhan la sra brkyang gding bar mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not spread the mat during any time other than the sixteen-day period of the middle autumn month.

original: dbyung ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbyung ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And also the spreading of the mat.

original: sra brkyang dbyung ba yang gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: sra brkyang dbyung ba yang gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la mi bya ba ste /
translated: One should not spread the mat at the end of the poṣadha.

original: 'dir ni de'i mtha' zhes bya ba gso sbyong gi nyi ma de nyid dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni de'i mtha' zhes bya ba gso sbyong gi nyi ma de nyid dang sbyar ro //
translated: Here, the end of that is connected to the poṣadha day itself.

original: de'i phyir gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la mi bya'o zhes dgag pa gnyis byas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la mi bya'o zhes dgag pa gnyis byas so //
translated: Therefore, the prohibition is made twice: “One should not spread the mat at the end of the poṣadha.”

original: de lta na yang dbyung ba yang gso sbyong gi mtha' kho na la bya bar bstan pas gding ba dang 'dra bar tshes bco lnga la gso sbyong byas ba'i phyi de nyin par tshes bcu drug la dbyung bar thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na yang dbyung ba yang gso sbyong gi mtha' kho na la bya bar bstan pas gding ba dang 'dra bar tshes bco lnga la gso sbyong byas ba'i phyi de nyin par tshes bcu drug la dbyung bar thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: Even so, since it is taught that the spreading of the mat should be done only at the end of the poṣadha, it would follow that the spreading of the mat should be done on the sixteenth day after the poṣadha is performed on the fifteenth day of the month.

original: 'di ni nyi ma de nyid kyi'o zhes bya ba smras te ;
analyzed: 'di ni nyi ma de nyid kyi'o zhes bya ba smras te ;
translated: To eliminate this, it is said, “This is on that very day.”

original: sra brkyang dbyung ba 'di ni gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga zhes bya ba de nyid la gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la sra brkyang dbyung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sra brkyang dbyung ba 'di ni gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga zhes bya ba de nyid la gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la sra brkyang dbyung ba yin gyi /
translated: This is the day for spreading out the straw mat, because the day for spreading out the straw mat is the fifteenth day of the confession ceremony.

original: tshes bcu drug la dbyung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshes bcu drug la dbyung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that the straw mat is spread out after the confession ceremony on that very day, and not on the sixteenth day.

original: brtsams pa 'di ni dge slong chom rkun gyis choms pa la sogs pa la brten nas dus ma yin par dbyung ba'i ched du byas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: brtsams pa 'di ni dge slong chom rkun gyis choms pa la sogs pa la brten nas dus ma yin par dbyung ba'i ched du byas pa yin gyi /
translated: This is done for the purpose of spreading out the straw mat at an inappropriate time, based on the monks being robbed by thieves and so on.

original: dus su dbyung ba la ni sra brkyang dbyung ba'i nyi ma nges pa yod pa'i phyir 'dir mdor brtsam mi dgos te /
analyzed: dus su dbyung ba la ni sra brkyang dbyung ba'i nyi ma nges pa yod pa'i phyir 'dir mdor brtsam mi dgos te /
translated: But for spreading out the straw mat at the proper time, it is not necessary to compose a sutra here, because there is a fixed day for spreading out the straw mat.

original: sra brkyang dus su dbyung ba'i nyi ma ni dpyid zlar ba nya la gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la dbyung ba yin no //
analyzed: sra brkyang dus su dbyung ba'i nyi ma ni dpyid zlar ba nya la gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la dbyung ba yin no //
translated: The day for spreading out the straw mat at the proper time is the day after the confession ceremony on the full moon of the first spring month.

original: de ltar na 'dir tshig gi don 'di 'byung ste ;
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir tshig gi don 'di 'byung ste ;
translated: Thus, this meaning of the words occurs here:

original: sra brkyang gding ba ni ston zla 'bring po nya la dgag dbye byas nas ston zla 'bring bo chos bcu drug la gding bar bya'o //
analyzed: sra brkyang gding ba ni ston zla 'bring po nya la dgag dbye byas nas ston zla 'bring bo chos bcu drug la gding bar bya'o //
translated: The time for spreading the rainy season retreat mat is from the new moon of the middle lunar month of autumn until the sixteenth day of the middle lunar month of autumn.

original: dus ma yin par dbyung pa la ni zla ba'i ngo des pa med de gso sbyong gi nyi ma gcig dang sbyar te /
analyzed: dus ma yin par dbyung pa la ni zla ba'i ngo des pa med de gso sbyong gi nyi ma gcig dang sbyar te /
translated: The time for taking out the rainy season retreat mat is not fixed. It is done on the same day as the poṣadha purification ceremony.

original: gso sbyong byas nas de'i mod la dbyung bar bya'i /
analyzed: gso sbyong byas nas de'i mod la dbyung bar bya'i /
translated: The rainy season retreat mat is taken out immediately after the poṣadha purification ceremony.

original: gso sbyong gi dus ma yin par ni dbyung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi dus ma yin par ni dbyung bar mi bya'o //
translated: It is not taken out at a time other than the poṣadha ceremony.

original: dus su dbyung ba ni dpyid zla ra ba nya la gso spyod byas nas de'i nyi ma nyid la dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dus su dbyung ba ni dpyid zla ra ba nya la gso spyod byas nas de'i nyi ma nyid la dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: The time for taking out the rainy season retreat mat is from the new moon of the first lunar month of spring until the sixteenth day of the first lunar month of spring.🔽If the resident monks take the poṣadha ceremony on the new moon of the middle lunar month of autumn and spread the rainy season retreat mat on the sixteenth day of the middle lunar month of autumn, then later,

original: gal te gnyug mar gnas pa dag gis ston zla 'bring po nyal dgag dbye byas nas ston zla 'bring po chos bcu drug la sra brkyang bting pa'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur pa gnyug mar gnas pa dag pas ches mang ba dag der lhags shing de dag
analyzed: gal te gnyug mar gnas pa dag gis ston zla 'bring po nyal dgag dbye byas nas ston zla 'bring po chos bcu drug la sra brkyang bting pa'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur pa gnyug mar gnas pa dag pas ches mang ba dag der lhags shing de dag
translated: if more visiting monks arrive than resident monks,

original: na re / deng tshes bco lnga'i gso sbyong yin no zhes zer na dus kyi phyir ni mang po dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya ba yin pas der sra brkyang gding ba'i nyi ma la gnyug mar gnas pa dag gso sbyong byed na de dag gis de @168a * //
analyzed: na re / deng tshes bco lnga'i gso sbyong yin no zhes zer na dus kyi phyir ni mang po dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya ba yin pas der sra brkyang gding ba'i nyi ma la gnyug mar gnas pa dag gso sbyong byed na de dag gis de @168a * //
translated: If someone says, “Today is the fifteenth, the day for the purification and restoration ceremony,” then one should follow the many who say that it is the proper time.

original: la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: If the resident monks perform the purification and restoration ceremony on the day that the summer retreat ends, how should they do it?

original: de'i phyir yang gso sbyong byas na phyung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang gso sbyong byas na phyung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “If they perform the purification and restoration ceremony again, the summer retreat is ended.”

original: 'dis kyang rnam par gzhan kyis dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: 'dis kyang rnam par gzhan kyis dbyung ba rang 'jug pa dang bral ba rnam par gzhag go //
translated: This also establishes that the summer retreat is ended by another factor, that is, by the monks themselves.

original: 'di ltar deng gso sbyong gi nyi ma yin no snyam pa'i blos yang gso sbyong byas na sra brkyang ba bting ba rang byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar deng gso sbyong gi nyi ma yin no snyam pa'i blos yang gso sbyong byas na sra brkyang ba bting ba rang byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the resident monks perform the purification and restoration ceremony again with the thought, “Today is the day for the purification and restoration ceremony,” then the summer retreat ends by itself.

original: 'di ltar bdag cag gis dus ma yin par sra brkyang gding ngo snyam du de la mi ltos pa'i blo skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag cag gis dus ma yin par sra brkyang gding ngo snyam du de la mi ltos pa'i blo skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the thought that does not depend on the summer retreat, “We will spread the floor covers out of season,” arises.

original: yang nyi ma gnyis pa la sra brkyang gding bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang nyi ma gnyis pa la sra brkyang gding bar bya ste /
translated: Again, on the second day, they should spread out the rainy season robe.

original: de'i tshe na ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug yin pa'i blo skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe na ston zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug yin pa'i blo skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, the sixteenth day of the middle autumn month arises in their minds.

original: bkra shis kyi gso sbyong de'i nyin mo byas pa la ni 'dir thal bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bkra shis kyi gso sbyong de'i nyin mo byas pa la ni 'dir thal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: The purification ceremony of auspiciousness is not performed on that day,

original: de na dus ma yin par bting ba'i blo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na dus ma yin par bting ba'i blo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no thought to spread it out at an inappropriate time.

original: bting nas bye ba dag la ni de tha dad par 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bting nas bye ba dag la ni de tha dad par 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is spread out and the Saṅgha splits, it is established as separate for each faction.

original: sra brkyang bting nas de'i 'og tu dge 'dun bye bar gyur na dge slong de dag la sra brkyang dbyung bde tha dad par 'grub ste /
analyzed: sra brkyang bting nas de'i 'og tu dge 'dun bye bar gyur na dge slong de dag la sra brkyang dbyung bde tha dad par 'grub ste /
translated: If the rainy season robe is spread out and the Saṅgha splits after that, then the rainy season robe is established as separate for each faction of monks.

original: phyogs gcig gis phyung zin nas phyogs cig shos kyis kyang dbyung dgos te /
analyzed: phyogs gcig gis phyung zin nas phyogs cig shos kyis kyang dbyung dgos te /
translated: If one faction spreads it out, the other faction must also spread it out.

original: 'di la gding ba gcig yin pa'i phyir phyogs cig shos kyis kyang phyung ba nyid yin no snyam du shes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la gding ba gcig yin pa'i phyir phyogs cig shos kyis kyang phyung ba nyid yin no snyam du shes par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not think that if it is spread out by one faction, it is also spread out by the other faction, because it is a single spreading out.

original: chos smra ba dgra yod pas de gding ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos smra ba dgra yod pas de gding ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Dharma teacher should spread it because he has enemies.

original: gnas gang du dbyar gnas bar khas blangs nas sam dgag dbye byas nas dge 'dun bye bar gyur pa de na chos smra ba dag yod la /
analyzed: gnas gang du dbyar gnas bar khas blangs nas sam dgag dbye byas nas dge 'dun bye bar gyur pa de na chos smra ba dag yod la /
translated: If the Saṅgha splits in a place where the rainy season is entered or the lifting of the restrictions is performed, if there are Dharma teachers there,

original: chos ma yin pa smra ba dag kyang yod na chos smra ba dag yod pa'i phyogs des sra brkyang de gding bar bya /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa smra ba dag kyang yod na chos smra ba dag yod pa'i phyogs des sra brkyang de gding bar bya /
translated: and if there are also non-Dharma teachers, then the side with the Dharma teachers should spread the rainy season robe,

original: dbyung bar bya /
analyzed: dbyung bar bya /
translated: should lift it,

original: yongs su brkyang bar bya'o //🔽'dir gzhung ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun bye na gang gis sra brkyang gding bar bgyi /
analyzed: yongs su brkyang bar bya'o // 'dir gzhung ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun bye na gang gis sra brkyang gding bar bgyi /
translated: and should fully extend it.🔽Here, the text says, “If the Saṅgha of the rainy season is split, who should spread the rainy season robe?”

original: gang dag chos smra ba dag gis so zhes gsungs pa dang / de dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las kyang dge 'dun bye na sus sra brkyang gding bar bgyi /🔽chos smra ba dag gis te /
analyzed: gang dag chos smra ba dag gis so zhes gsungs pa dang / de dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las kyang dge 'dun bye na sus sra brkyang gding bar bgyi / chos smra ba dag gis te /
translated: And in the Sūtra Requested by the Daughter of a Brahmin, it says, “If the Saṅgha is split, who should spread the rainy season robe?”🔽The Dharma teachers should.

original: chos smra ba des ni dbang byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te ;
analyzed: chos smra ba des ni dbang byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te ;
translated: Because the Dharma teachers have control.

original: thams cad la yang gding ba dbyung bar ni mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad la yang gding ba dbyung bar ni mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: But it is not that they do not obtain the bedding.

original: der gzhan dag gis byas kyang gnas kyi rnyed pa ni de dag la 'os ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: der gzhan dag gis byas kyang gnas kyi rnyed pa ni de dag la 'os ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even if others do the work, the gain of the dwelling belongs to them.

original: gnas der dge slong dus 'dir gnas pa la rnyed pa 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes rnam pa de ltar gnas na @168b gnas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa dge slong rnams la rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'i gnas kyi rnyed pa de ni chos ma yin
analyzed: gnas der dge slong dus 'dir gnas pa la rnyed pa 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes rnam pa de ltar gnas na @168b gnas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa dge slong rnams la rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'i gnas kyi rnyed pa de ni chos ma yin
translated: If the gain of the dwelling is established for monks who dwell in that dwelling, thinking, “This gain is given to monks who dwell at this time,” then the gain of the dwelling that arises from the cause of dwelling belongs to those who speak Dharma.

original: pa smra ba gzhan dag gis sra brkyang gding ba byas kyang /🔽gnas kyi rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa ston zla 'bring po nya'i mthar thug pa'i dus tshun chad du byung ba gang yin pa de ni chos smra ba de dag la 'os pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: pa smra ba gzhan dag gis sra brkyang gding ba byas kyang / gnas kyi rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa ston zla 'bring po nya'i mthar thug pa'i dus tshun chad du byung ba gang yin pa de ni chos smra ba de dag la 'os pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Even if others who speak non-Dharma spread out the boundary ropes,

original: chos ma yin pa smra ba dag la ni 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa smra ba dag la ni 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: the gain of the dwelling that arises from the cause of dwelling belongs to those who speak Dharma, but not to those who speak non-Dharma.

original: phyogs gzhan du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are located in a different place.

original: gnas kyi rnyed pa zhes smos pas ni rnyed pa gzhan gcad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gnas kyi rnyed pa zhes smos pas ni rnyed pa gzhan gcad pa'i phyir te /
translated: The phrase “gain of the site” is stated to exclude other kinds of gain.

original: des na sra brkyang bting ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad la 'os pa nyid yin no //🔽rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su de spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: des na sra brkyang bting ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad la 'os pa nyid yin no // rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su de spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, the gain that arises from the cause of the site is appropriate for all.🔽The phrase “it does not arise for those who have abandoned it in a natural site” means

original: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su sra brkyang 'ding bar byed pa de spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su sra brkyang 'ding bar byed pa de spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: that it does not arise for those who have abandoned the cause of the site in a natural site.

original: bsam pas gnas pa ni bting ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsam pas gnas pa ni bting ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “it arises through intention in a site” means

original: 'di las bdag gi rnyed pa dang phan yon 'byung ngo snyam du de ltar bsam pas don du gnyer bar 'jug pa de ni sra brkyang bting ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di las bdag gi rnyed pa dang phan yon 'byung ngo snyam du de ltar bsam pas don du gnyer bar 'jug pa de ni sra brkyang bting ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: that it arises through the intention that thinks, “My gain and benefit will arise from this.”

original: lhan cig tu bya ba la 'dun pa phul ba'i dbang gis lhag ma rnams kyis byas na byas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhan cig tu bya ba la 'dun pa phul ba'i dbang gis lhag ma rnams kyis byas na byas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If the remaining monks do it by the power of offering their assent to the action, then it is done.

original: bsam pas gnas pa ni bting pa yin la de dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin pas /
analyzed: bsam pas gnas pa ni bting pa yin la de dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin pas /
translated: The meaning of the first sentence is that the action of spreading is to remain with that intention and the action of taking up is to be free from that intention.

original: de'i phyir gzhan dag dang lhan cig bya ba gang yin pa'i bya ba de dge slong 'dun pa blangs pa lhag ma dag gis byas na 'dun pa 'bul bar byed pas kyang 'dun pa phul ba'i dbang gis byas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan dag dang lhan cig bya ba gang yin pa'i bya ba de dge slong 'dun pa blangs pa lhag ma dag gis byas na 'dun pa 'bul bar byed pas kyang 'dun pa phul ba'i dbang gis byas pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, if the remaining monks do the action that is to be done together with others by the power of offering their assent to the action, then the action is done by the power of offering their assent.

original: de dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of the second sentence is that the action of taking up is to be free from that intention.

original: bsam pas gnas pa de dang bral ba ni sra brkyang phyung ba yin no //
analyzed: bsam pas gnas pa de dang bral ba ni sra brkyang phyung ba yin no //
translated: The action of taking up is to be free from the intention to remain.

original: de'i phyir 'dun pa ma phul ba la ni 'dug tu zin kyang gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs na ma thos kyi bar du bting ba dang phyung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dun pa ma phul ba la ni 'dug tu zin kyang gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs na ma thos kyi bar du bting ba dang phyung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, even if one offers assent, if one falls asleep or enters meditative attainment while remaining in that place, then the action of spreading and taking up is not done until one hears the announcement.

original: gang gi phyir bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin la de dang bral ba ni byung ba yin pa de'i phyir gang gis 'dun pa ma phul ba la ni dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug tu zin kyang gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs na ji srid du
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin la de dang bral ba ni byung ba yin pa de'i phyir gang gis 'dun pa ma phul ba la ni dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug tu zin kyang gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs na ji srid du
translated: Because the arrangement of the saṃgha is the laying out of the mat and the removal of the saṃgha is the removal of the mat, therefore, if one does not offer one’s assent, then even if one is present in the saṃgha, one will not be counted as present if one falls asleep or enters meditative attainment.

original: sra brkyang bting ba 'am phyung ba ma thos kyi bar du de la sra brkyang bting ba 'am byung ba mi 'byung ste 'dun pa ma phul ba'i @169a * //
analyzed: sra brkyang bting ba 'am phyung ba ma thos kyi bar du de la sra brkyang bting ba 'am byung ba mi 'byung ste 'dun pa ma phul ba'i @169a * //
translated: Until one hears that the mat has been laid out or removed, the laying out or removal of the mat will not occur for one.

original: phyir ro // thos na ni bting ba dang phyung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir ro // thos na ni bting ba dang phyung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if one hears that the mat has been laid out or removed, then the laying out or removal of the mat will occur.

original: 'dun pa phul ba la ni gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs su zin kyang ma thos pa'i mdun du yang bting ba dang phyung ba 'byung ba kho nang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dun pa phul ba la ni gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs su zin kyang ma thos pa'i mdun du yang bting ba dang phyung ba 'byung ba kho nang 'gyur ro //
translated: If one offers one’s assent, then even if one falls asleep or enters meditative attainment, the laying out or removal of the mat will occur in one’s presence, even if one does not hear it.

original: mtshams gcig pa nyid yin na der gnas gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyang bting ba'i phyir gnas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshams gcig pa nyid yin na der gnas gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyang bting ba'i phyir gnas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one is in the same boundary, then even if one is in another residence, the laying out of the mat will occur for one.

original: mtshams gcig gi nang na gnas du ma yod na dbyar der kha cig ni gnas gcig tu gnas shing lhag ma yang gzhan du gnas na de dag thams cad sra brkyang bting ba'i phyir gnas pa ni yin la /
analyzed: mtshams gcig gi nang na gnas du ma yod na dbyar der kha cig ni gnas gcig tu gnas shing lhag ma yang gzhan du gnas na de dag thams cad sra brkyang bting ba'i phyir gnas pa ni yin la /
translated: If there are many abodes within one boundary, then some abide in one abode during the summer, and the remainder also abide elsewhere.

original: rnyed pa'i phyir gnas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnyed pa'i phyir gnas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: All of them abide for the sake of the rainy season, but they do not abide for the sake of gain.

original: de dag la gnas kyi rnyed pa ni bdag pos ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: de dag la gnas kyi rnyed pa ni bdag pos ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rnam par gnas so //
translated: The gain of those abodes is determined by the owner.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: mtshams gcig gi nang na gnas du ma yod pa der cig car dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dag sra brkyang bting ba'i phyir thams cad du gnas pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: mtshams gcig gi nang na gnas du ma yod pa der cig car dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dag sra brkyang bting ba'i phyir thams cad du gnas pa nyid yin na /
translated: If those who have accepted the rainy season abiding in many abodes within one boundary abide in all of them for the sake of the rainy season,

original: des na gnas gcig tu sra brkyang bting yang thams cad du bting bar 'gyur te 'dir don ni de yin no //
analyzed: des na gnas gcig tu sra brkyang bting yang thams cad du bting bar 'gyur te 'dir don ni de yin no //
translated: then even though the rainy season is set up in one abode, it is set up in all of them. This is the meaning here.

original: dbyar dag la ni mtshams gcig pa nyid gyis gnas gcig yin pas /
analyzed: dbyar dag la ni mtshams gcig pa nyid gyis gnas gcig yin pas /
translated: In the rainy season, they are one abode because they are one boundary.

original: dbyar gyi 'og tu sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dus kyi bar du yang mtshams gcig go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dbyar gyi 'og tu sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dus kyi bar du yang mtshams gcig go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The text here is:

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge slong dag mtshams kyi nang du gnas bzhi 'am lnga bgyis te dbyar gnas par khas len cing dgag dbye bgyis nas sra brkyang bting bar bgyid na gnas de dag thams cad du sra brkyang bting bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge slong dag mtshams kyi nang du gnas bzhi 'am lnga bgyis te dbyar gnas par khas len cing dgag dbye bgyis nas sra brkyang bting bar bgyid na gnas de dag thams cad du sra brkyang bting bar 'gyur ram /
translated: “Venerable, if the monks first agree to spend the rainy season in four or five places within the same boundary, perform the invitation ceremony, and then spread the rainy season retreat mat, is the rainy season retreat mat spread in all those places?

original: nye ba 'khor thams cad du sra brkyang ba ting bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor thams cad du sra brkyang ba ting bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upāli, the rainy season retreat mat is spread in all those places.”

original: de ni bting ba'i tshe de na gnas de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni bting ba'i tshe de na gnas de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “That is the very place where it is spread” means:

original: gnas gzhan de ni gnas de nyid yin te /
analyzed: gnas gzhan de ni gnas de nyid yin te /
translated: That other place is the very same place.

original: de nyid gnas 'di yin gyi gnas tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid gnas 'di yin gyi gnas tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: That very place is this place; it is not a different place.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When?

original: bting ba'i cho na ste sra brkyang bting ba'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: bting ba'i cho na ste sra brkyang bting ba'i tshe na'o //
translated: When the rainy season retreat mat is spread.

original: de'i tshe na mtshams gcig pa de na ste mtshams gcig pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe na mtshams gcig pa de na ste mtshams gcig pa yin na'o //
translated: At that time, they are in the same boundary, that is, they are in one boundary.

original: de ltar gnas gzhan du sra brkyang 'ding bar byed pa yang de'i tshe na de nyid du 'ding bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gnas gzhan du sra brkyang 'ding bar byed pa yang de'i tshe na de nyid du 'ding bar byed pa yin no //
translated: In this way, when they spread out the rainy season retreat in another place, at that time they spread it out in just that place.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: 'di ltar dbyar dag la gnas du ma mtshams tha dad pa dag sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dus su ston zla 'bring po chos @169b bcu drug la mtshams rnams bskyed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbyar dag la gnas du ma mtshams tha dad pa dag sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dus su ston zla 'bring po chos @169b bcu drug la mtshams rnams bskyed de /
translated: In this way, in the rainy season, in many different places with different boundaries, on the sixteenth day of the middle autumn month, the time for spreading out the rainy season retreat, the boundaries are created.

original: gnas de dag thams cad mtshams gcig na gnas par gyur na de'i tshe gnas gang yang rung bar sra brkyang 'ding bar byed na /
analyzed: gnas de dag thams cad mtshams gcig na gnas par gyur na de'i tshe gnas gang yang rung bar sra brkyang 'ding bar byed na /
translated: When all those places become one boundary, at that time, if they spread out the rainy season retreat in any place,

original: gnas gzhan thams cad du dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong thams cad kyis sra brkyang bting bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gnas gzhan thams cad du dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong thams cad kyis sra brkyang bting bar rig par bya ste /
translated: in all the other places, all the monks who are staying for the rainy season should know that the rainy season retreat has been spread out.

original: 'ding ba'i dus na mtshams gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ding ba'i dus na mtshams gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at the time of spreading it out, it is one boundary.

original: 'dir gzhung ni nye ba 'khor dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum gnas pas dpyar gyi zla ba gsum 'das nas de nyid kyi tshes bcu drug la mtshams chen po bshig ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni nye ba 'khor dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum gnas pas dpyar gyi zla ba gsum 'das nas de nyid kyi tshes bcu drug la mtshams chen po bshig ste /
translated: When the saṅgha of fully ordained monks who are close disciples live for three months, after the three months of winter have passed, on the sixteenth of that month they destroy the great boundary.

original: gnas bzhi'am lnga mtshams gcig tu byas nas sra brkyang 'ding bar byed na gnas de dag thams cad du sra brkyang bting bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas bzhi'am lnga mtshams gcig tu byas nas sra brkyang 'ding bar byed na gnas de dag thams cad du sra brkyang bting bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If they make four or five abodes into a single boundary and spread the rainy season retreat, then it is said that the rainy season retreat is spread in all those abodes.

original: bting nas mtshams tha dad par byas na gang yang rung ba de las de'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bting nas mtshams tha dad par byas na gang yang rung ba de las de'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is spread and the boundary is made different, then any of those is its abode.

original: mtshams gcig tu gnas du ma gang yang rung bar sra brkyang bting nas phyis mtshams tha dad par byas na /
analyzed: mtshams gcig tu gnas du ma gang yang rung bar sra brkyang bting nas phyis mtshams tha dad par byas na /
translated: If the rainy season retreat is spread in any of many abodes within a single boundary and later the boundary is made different,

original: sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas du ma de las gnas gang yang rung ba chos gos de'i gnas yin pa ste /
analyzed: sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas du ma de las gnas gang yang rung ba chos gos de'i gnas yin pa ste /
translated: then any of those many abodes where the rainy season retreat is spread is the abode of that robe.

original: gnas gang du chos gos gding ba'i las byas pa'i gnas de nyid de'i gnas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gnas gang du chos gos gding ba'i las byas pa'i gnas de nyid de'i gnas ma yin gyi /
translated: The abode where the action of spreading the robe is performed is not its abode.

original: gnas gang yang rung bar bzhag na yang rang gi gnas khon na gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas gang yang rung bar bzhag na yang rang gi gnas khon na gnas pa yin no //
translated: If it is set up in any place, it is set up in its own place.🔽Here the text states:

analyzed: so so'i mtshams 'gums bar bgyid na sra brkyang phyung bar brjod par bgyi'am nye ba 'khor mi bya'o //

analyzed: gnas de dag thams cad du sra brkyang gding bar 'gyur ram / nye ba 'khor sra brkyang bting bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no /

original: tha dad pa nyid yin na gnas so sor de dbyung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid yin na gnas so sor de dbyung ngo zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas mang po dag gis mtshams tha dad pa nyid yin na /
translated: If the boundaries of the many places where the rainy season is entered are different,

analyzed: gnas so so so sor sra brkyang de dbyung dgos kyi thams cad kyis gcig tu dbyung du ni mi rung ngo //

analyzed: gal te gnas gang sra brkyang gzhag pa'i gnas der sra brkyang 'byin par byed na /
translated: If the saṃgha establishes the rainy season retreat in a place where the retreat has already been established,

analyzed: gnas gzhan na gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis sra brkyang de rang gi gnas du spo bar bya'o //

analyzed: yang na rang gi gnas nas dge slong 'ga' zhig sra brkyang gi gan du gzhag par bya ste /

original: des skya rengs 'char ba'i dus @170a * //
analyzed: des skya rengs 'char ba'i dus @170a * //
translated: At the time of dawn,

original: su 'bral ba'i nyes pa sel bar byed do //
analyzed: su 'bral ba'i nyes pa sel bar byed do //
translated: they should remove the fault of separation.

original: gzhan du na skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su sra brkyang dbyung bar 'jug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang 'bral ba'i nyes par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su sra brkyang dbyung bar 'jug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang 'bral ba'i nyes par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, at the time of dawn, they would be separated from the entry into the retreat and would incur the fault of separation.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa gal te sra brkyang bting nas mtshams chen po bshig ste so so'i mtshams kun nas sra brkyang 'byin par bgyid na gnas de dag thams cad du sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa gal te sra brkyang bting nas mtshams chen po bshig ste so so'i mtshams kun nas sra brkyang 'byin par bgyid na gnas de dag thams cad du sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: Here, the text says, “Venerable, if the saṃgha destroys the great boundary after establishing the rainy season retreat and removes the retreat from all the individual boundaries, does the retreat end in all those places?

original: nye ba 'khor mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi 'gyur te /
translated: Upāli, it does not.

original: gang dag 'byin par byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang dag 'byin par byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur la /

original: gang dag 'byin par mi byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dag 'byin par mi byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: mtshams gcig pa nyid du ni phyung na thams cad kyis sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshams gcig pa nyid du ni phyung na thams cad kyis sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //

original: bye ba nyid na phyogs so so'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bye ba nyid na phyogs so so'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If there is a schism, it is in each direction.

original: gnas gcig tu gtogs pa nyid yin na dge 'dun bye zhing phyogs gnyis su gyur na /
analyzed: gnas gcig tu gtogs pa nyid yin na dge 'dun bye zhing phyogs gnyis su gyur na /
translated: If it belongs to one residence, if the Saṅgha splits into two factions,

original: phyogs gcig gis phyung bas phyogs cig shos kyis phyung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phyogs gcig gis phyung bas phyogs cig shos kyis phyung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: lifting it up in one faction does not lift it up in the other faction.

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
translated: Here is the text from the Sūtra Requested by the Son of a Brahmin:

original: sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na /
analyzed: sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na /

analyzed: der phyogs gcig gam cig shos kyis sra brkyang 'byin par bgyid na de dag thams cad kyis sra brkyang phyung bar brjod par bgyi'am /

original: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
translated: Upāli, they do not.

original: gang dag 'byin par byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang dag 'byin par byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur la /

original: gang dag mi byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang dag mi byed pa de dag gis ni sra brkyang phyung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //

original: ma bting bas phyung ba ni ma phyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma bting bas phyung ba ni ma phyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That which is cast out by not spreading is not not cast out.

analyzed: gnas gzhan du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang dag la sra brkyang gding ba med pa de dag ni ma bting ba zhes bya ste /
translated: Those who vow to stay in the rainy season in another place where the rainy season is not spread is called not spread.

original: ma bting ba'i gang zag de dag gis sra brkyang phyung pa gang yin pa de ni ma phyung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ma bting ba'i gang zag de dag gis sra brkyang phyung pa gang yin pa de ni ma phyung ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is cast out by those individuals who do not spread is not not cast out.

original: phyung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyung ba nyid yin no //
translated: It is cast out.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis sra brkyang bting nas mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis shing ltos pa ma mchis par gyur nas /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis sra brkyang bting nas mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis shing ltos pa ma mchis par gyur nas /
translated: Venerable, if monks who are staying during the rainy season lay out the rainy season robes and then go outside the boundaries and are not dependent on the saṃgha,

original: dge slong glo bur ba dag lhags te sra brkyang 'byin par bgyid na sra brkyang phyung bar brjod par bgyi 'am /
analyzed: dge slong glo bur ba dag lhags te sra brkyang 'byin par bgyid na sra brkyang phyung bar brjod par bgyi 'am /

original: nye ba 'khor phyung bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor phyung bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upāli, they should be said to be taken up.

original: mi 'byung @170b ba nyid kyis kha bskang du mi rung ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi 'byung @170b ba nyid kyis kha bskang du mi rung ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: gnas gzhan du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa gang la sra brkyang 'ding ba 'byung ba med pa de ni mi 'byung ba nyid ces bya ste /
translated: Those who agree to stay during the rainy season in another place where the laying out of the rainy season robes does not occur are called those who do not come.

original: mi 'byung ba nyid kyi gang zag des sra brkyang 'dir bar byed pa'i dge slong dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i kha bskang du mi rung ba nyid ma yin te rung ngo //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba nyid kyi gang zag des sra brkyang 'dir bar byed pa'i dge slong dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i kha bskang du mi rung ba nyid ma yin te rung ngo //
translated: It is not unsuitable to supplement the saṃgha of monks who lay out the rainy season robes with those who do not come. It is suitable.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gcig pu dbyar gnas par khas len cing /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gcig pu dbyar gnas par khas len cing /

analyzed: des dgung bla gsum po dag 'das nas dgag dbye bgyis te /

original: dge 'dun la sra brkyang 'ding ba'i chos gos 'bul bar bgyid cing der dge slong glo bur ba dag lhags shing de dag sra brkyang 'ding ba'i rjes su zhugs te dong na chos gos de sus 'thob par 'gyur lags /

analyzed: kha tshar dang phun tshar ma bcad pa ste de ni khyim pa'i gos yin pa'i phyir bkag go //
translated: The edges and the fringe are not cut off, because that is the clothing of householders.

original: 'dir gzhung ni de lta bas na dge slong dag gis khyim bdag gi gos mtshon gyis dras pa dag kha dog ngan pa byas te bcang bar gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni de lta bas na dge slong dag gis khyim bdag gi gos mtshon gyis dras pa dag kha dog ngan pa byas te bcang bar gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The text says, “Therefore, monks, you should wear the clothing of householders that has been cut with a knife and made ugly.”

original: dras shing drubs pa chos gos nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o @171b zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dras shing drubs pa chos gos nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o @171b zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should consecrate the robe that is cut and sewn.

original: glags bur dras shing drubs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: glags bur dras shing drubs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: This means that it is cut and sewn temporarily.

original: de chos gos nyid du bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: de chos gos nyid du bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: It should be consecrated so that it can be used as a robe.

original: rnam pa gang gis drubs pa zhen de'i phyir snam phran snrel zhi nyid dang lhag ma mnyam pa nyid dang dbus nas gzhan du tshal bu'i 'phro phyogs phyogs su lta ba nyid dang mtha' bskor ba nyid dag gis so zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis drubs pa zhen de'i phyir snam phran snrel zhi nyid dang lhag ma mnyam pa nyid dang dbus nas gzhan du tshal bu'i 'phro phyogs phyogs su lta ba nyid dang mtha' bskor ba nyid dag gis so zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The consecration is done in terms of the type of sewing, because the robe is sewn with strips of cloth that are sewn together, the rest is sewn evenly, and the strips of cloth are sewn in the middle, with the edges of the strips turned to the left and right and sewn together.

original: zheng du btang ba'i glegs bu'i tshad dag ni sngar zla bas spang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs su glegs bu phyed dang gsum pa nyid dang glegs bu phyed dang bzhi pa nyid dang / glags bu phyed dang lnga pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: zheng du btang ba'i glegs bu'i tshad dag ni sngar zla bas spang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs su glegs bu phyed dang gsum pa nyid dang glegs bu phyed dang bzhi pa nyid dang / glags bu phyed dang lnga pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: The size of the palm leaf is determined by its width, as explained in the chapter on the analysis of the moon:🔽a palm leaf is one-third of a cubit, one-fourth of a cubit, one-fifth of a cubit, and so on.🔽The size of the palm leaf is determined by its length, as explained in three ways:

original: srid du btang ba'i glegs bu'i tshad dag ni snam phran snrel zhi nyid dang / lhag ma mnyam pa nyid dang / dbus nas gzhan du glegs bu'i 'phro phyogs phyogs su lta ba nyid ces bya ba rnam pa 'di gsum ltar bya'o //
analyzed: srid du btang ba'i glegs bu'i tshad dag ni snam phran snrel zhi nyid dang / lhag ma mnyam pa nyid dang / dbus nas gzhan du glegs bu'i 'phro phyogs phyogs su lta ba nyid ces bya ba rnam pa 'di gsum ltar bya'o //
translated: the middle is straight, the rest is even, and the leaf is turned to the right.

original: mtha' bskor ba nyid ces bya ba ni mtha' thams cad bskor ba ste /
analyzed: mtha' bskor ba nyid ces bya ba ni mtha' thams cad bskor ba ste /
translated: The leaf is turned to the right means that the leaf is turned to the right in all directions.

original: mtha' zhes smos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' zhes smos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the word end is used.

original: de lta bas na mdo 'di ni srid du btang ba'i glegs bu'i tshad dag dang mtha' skor gyi dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na mdo 'di ni srid du btang ba'i glegs bu'i tshad dag dang mtha' skor gyi dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this sutra is stated from the perspective of the size of the palm leaf in terms of its length and its circumference.

original: de la snam phran snrel zhi nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de la snam phran snrel zhi nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: The term “even” in the phrase “evenly spaced” refers to the fact that the strips of cloth are not cut straight.

original: 'dir snam phran zhes bya ba'i sgra ni srid du btang ba'i tshal bu la bya'o /
analyzed: 'dir snam phran zhes bya ba'i sgra ni srid du btang ba'i tshal bu la bya'o /
translated: The term “strip” here refers to a piece of cloth that has been cut to length.

original: snrel zhi zhes bya ba ni srid du btang ba'i snam phran dag gi tshal bu rnams kyis sna drang thang du ma bab par mthon dman mi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'grus thabs nyid du 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: snrel zhi zhes bya ba ni srid du btang ba'i snam phran dag gi tshal bu rnams kyis sna drang thang du ma bab par mthon dman mi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'grus thabs nyid du 'dug pa'o //
translated: “Evenly spaced” means that the strips of cloth that have been cut to length are not cut straight, but are cut in such a way that they are not even, but are high in some places and low in others.

original: de'i dngos po ni de nyid do //🔽lhag ma mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la lhag ma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de nyid do // lhag ma mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la lhag ma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The nature of this is just that.
